Please add the cURLs of your tests here:
A JWT needs to be generated from this endpoint curl -X POST https://localhost:7629/api/Auth -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{ \"username\": \"user@example.com\", \"password\": \"MyPass123\", \"role\": \"Admin\"}", the values shouldn't be changed, they are HC since the Auth was implemented with basic functionality in order to generate the JWT to Authorize the other endpoints

JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the input below.
Example: "Bearer 12345abcdef"

Get all showtimes curl -X GET  https://localhost:7629/api/Showtime   -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..y_LCmVkB5CPnk83SMzHtBJV4u4LJIvjpoM1UZanSNSo"

Create showtimes curl -X POST  https://localhost:7629/api/Showtime    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..y_LCmVkB5CPnk83SMzHtBJV4u4LJIvjpoM1UZanSNSo"  -H "Content-Type: application/json"  -d "{  \"movieId\": \"tt0167260\",  \"sessionDate\": \"2023-07-02T20:36:14.835Z\",  \"auditoriumId\": 1}"

Get showtime by id curl -X GET  https://localhost:7629/api/Showtime/1    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..y_LCmVkB5CPnk83SMzHtBJV4u4LJIvjpoM1UZanSNSo"

Get all tickets curl -X GET  https://localhost:7629/api/Ticket   -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..KTwsNy39fQQ-nxV6xzXz8aI6tCsvQ0DATez3tGqAp9c"

Get ticket by id curl -X GET  https://localhost:7629/api/Ticket/2c6e98ba-99aa-43a9-8ca3-9431bc8440cd  -H "accept: text/plain"  -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5jyzN0fMFtc8R3VoE56r92SOGzk7knlqvi-_PcaAd48"

Reserve seats /api/Ticket/reserve curl -X POST  https://localhost:7629/api/Ticket/reserve    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..y_LCmVkB5CPnk83SMzHtBJV4u4LJIvjpoM1UZanSNSo"  -H "Content-Type: application/json"  -d "{  \"reservation\": {    \"showtimeId\": 1,    \"seats\": [      {        \"row\": 1,        \"seatNumber\": 1      }    ]  }}"


Buy seats curl -X PUT  https://localhost:7629/api/Ticket/buy    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..y_LCmVkB5CPnk83SMzHtBJV4u4LJIvjpoM1UZanSNSo"  -H "Content-Type: application/json"  -d "{  \"id\": \"9277a103-d8f4-487e-ab16-cf21f94a4dd4\"}"
